definition.name: NXsai_controller
definition.doc: (definition implied by usage) Subclass of NXinstrument used by Soleil. This class appears in the example data files provided from Soleil. This class should be considered as a base class (and relocated there, once approved by the NIAC).

group.name: TriggerNumber
group.doc: set to 0 at init, means that extern trigger mode disabled. if triggerNumber > 0, means extern trigger mode enabled. read part is the current trigger
